name: Anonymous
review: Earthly Jewels are absolutely the best!!! I can't say this enough. The ring is so exquisite, brilliant and stunning! They manufacture their own diamonds, and as such they give you the actual price, no middlemen cuts! You get the absolute most value for every pound you spend. I stumbled into their website after going around in circles with many UK, US, Indian and Thai jewelers looking for the best deal for the carat I wanted, and then I saw found them. I couldn't get the ring I wanted on their website (I wanted the ring metal to be platinum), so I sent a message to them via the WhatsApp link on their website (I know, I was worried as well that this could be disastrous), and their staff on the other end were so patient and professional with understanding my requirements, keeping updated all through the process and sending me the ring! And the ring came with its IGI certificate, and I just got the ring valued locally for insurance and the replacement value is way higher than what I paid; talk about fair pricing! Oh, they even reduced the total amount to be paid when they realised that they had used less platinum than expected, saving extra bucks. Guys, no need to stress with local jewellers when you can order directly from India! Honestly, I wish there was a way to promote them everywhere to help anyone looking to propose find the best value for money.

name: Anonymous
review:
Thanks for the most perfect and stunning  ring!

I wanted to share my experience with EARTHLY JEWELS and my extremely helpful consultant Tejas, it wouldn't have been possible without him. Tejas was very helpful since the beginning of the process.

We started by selecting the diamond (carat weight, color, cut etc.). I knew the cut of the diamond that I wanted since the beginning, but he helped me get the right carat weight since I didn't want the stone either too big or too small. Tejas gave me a couple options and  ended up picking the perfect  colour and carat weight, all thanks to his help.

Then he helped me with the ring setting. I showed him photos of the type of ring that I wanted and the material of the setting. At the end he gave me all the details of the ring to confirm, and time that it would be ready. Tejas helped me with the payment process which was very simple and after a few weeks he showed me a video of the ring completed.

Then the ring was shipped to me. The ring was gorgeous, stunning, no words to describe it. It is all I wanted. The shape of the ring setting, the stones shining everything perfectly done. Thank you so much Tejas and EARTHLY JEWELS for all your help in creating  perfect ring. Totally recommended 10/10. I'm looking forward to starting the process of creating a few more rings with you.

name: Anonymous
review: Fabulous product and very responsive team

review: I had an exceptionally positive experience purchasing a ring from Earthly Jewels. From the initial interaction to receiving the ring, the entire process was efficient and hassle-free. review: We feel fortunate to have found Earthly Jewels for our engagement rings. They have a very dreamy collection of rings, for everyone. A very technical and methodical process was followed to get the right fit of rings and keeping the customer engaged throughout. They follow a very strict delivery protocol, which assures that the delivery would be handed over to the right person and within committed time. Living up to their motto, ‚ÄúA Diamond for Every Story‚Äù. Thank you Earthly Jewels for this dreamy experience!

i was planning to buy my dream ring since ages..i had lot of questions about lab grown diamonds and wanted to customise it like i imagined..Through out the process Tejas from EJ helped me a-lot with all the details and answer my questions patiently and trust me i have asked like million of times..he also made sure that the product is designed just like i wanted and delivered to me on time and also gave me very good amount of discount..

Close your eyes and just grab your dream ring here cause believe me you are not gonna find better price and quality than here...

Be smart and go for lab grown diamonds and go with Earthly...

name: Anonymous
review: I'm utterly enchanted with my Earthly Jewels lab-grown diamond solitaire! Its radiant brilliance and flawless beauty are on par with a natural diamond - it's impossible to tell the difference! The sleek design and refined craftsmanship evoke a sense of opulence and refinement. I've long coveted a solitaire of this caliber, and now that it's mine, I feel like I'm wearing a dream come true. The fact that it's eco-friendly only adds to its allure.

name: Anonymous
review: I am absolutely thrilled with my Earthly Jewels lab-grown diamond solitaire! The moment I laid eyes on it, I knew I had found my dream piece. Its breathtaking sparkle and fire are indistinguishable from a natural diamond - truly, no one can tell it's lab-grown! The elegance and sophistication it exudes are unparalleled. I feel like I'm wearing a piece of luxury that's not only stunning but also sustainable. My dream of owning a beautiful solitaire has finally come true, and I couldn't be happier with my choice.
